channel.title: Comments on: Today, I joined the Dark Matter crowd on the best month of the year. Happy Spooktober!
channel.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is a first-person shooter video game developed by Treyarch and Raven Software and published by Activision. r/BlackOpsColdWar is a developer-recognized community focused on the title.

item.title: By: CentrasFinestMilk
item.dc:creator: CentrasFinestMilk
item.description: How could you see anything with that sight
item.content:encoded: How could you see anything with that sight

item.title: By: ILoveTheM1014
item.dc:creator: ILoveTheM1014
item.description: I am impressed you saved assault rifles for last. ARs and SMGs were the first done for me then I did snipers and launchers
item.content:encoded: I am impressed you saved assault rifles for last. ARs and SMGs were the first done for me then I did snipers and launchers ðŸ˜–

item.title: By: hvperRL
item.dc:creator: hvperRL
item.description: Always surprised by how little people aim for the head in zombies. I usually finish the game with almost as many crits as the next persons kills, if not more
item.content:encoded: Always surprised by how little people aim for the head in zombies. I usually finish the game with almost as many crits as the next persons kills, if not more
